name: Shape Dungeon
description:
This game was created during Secret Santa Jam 2020

This is a simple roguelike in old ruins.
Kill the enemies, complete levels, and get the highest score!

Developer: Shelhelix (https://github.com/shelhelix , Shelhelix#5610)

Used assets:

  • Great bgm was made by Vyra (https://soundcloud.com/vyramusic)
  • Awesome background art by Szadi art (https://itch.io/profile/szadiart) 
  • Nice Shapes package by Freya Holmér (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/shapes-173167)
